name: Simple search for nearest centers
description: Builds matrix, containing the index of the nearest from several centers (specified by their "positions") for every pixel of this matrix

in_ports.name: sample_image
in_ports.hint: If specified, this image defines dimensions of the result. Content of this image is ignored.

in_ports.name: positions
in_ports.hint: Positions of several points at the plane, named "centers", numbered from 1

out_ports.name: labels
out_ports.hint: Indexes of the nearest center for each pixel of the resulting matrix, numbered from 1 (zero values are impossible)
